articles.title: Australian basketball team's bronze medal at Tokyo Olympics feels more like gold - ABC News
articles.description: Decades of work by generations of Australian basketball players and coaches has finally been rewarded. Perhaps no bronze medal in Australia's long history at the Olympic Games has ever meant so much, writes Tracey Holmes.
articles.content:
Does a bronze medal feel like gold?
